ActorRef & Theron::ActorRef::operator= ( const ActorRef &  other  )  [inline]

Assignment operator.

Sets this actor reference to reference the same actor as another. After assignment the actor previously referenced by this ActorRef, if any, is no longer referenced, and will be garbage collected if it has become completely unreferenced.

Although ActorRef objects are relatively lightweight, it is still faster to reference an existing ActorRef than to assign it to another copy.
